title: Unfavorable balance of trade with Britain - cause

content.question: One important reason for the United States unfavorable balance of trade with Great Britain in the mid-1780s was the

choices.label: United States governmentâ€™s inability to convert dollars to British sterling
British dumping of manufactured goods on the United States market
conversion of the United States economy to manufacturing rather than agriculture
high export duties on goods produced in the United States
burdensome taxes imposed by the Confederation Congress

content.answer: British dumping of manufactured goods on the United States market

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
